title: mangaLa rupiNiyE
sahitya:
mangaLa rUpiNiyE mAvUr vaLar mAtangi mAmaNiyE



caraNam 1



gangaiyaNi paraman kaNmaNiyE nIyE mangai manOnmaNiyE



caraNam 2



shakti dhanam kalvi tandiDum tAyE muktikku vittum nIyE



caraNam 3



dEvarum mUvarum ninnaruLAlE tigazhuginrArgaL menmElE



caraNam 4



AviyE amudE Anandat-tEnE harikEshar manam magizhmAnE
